title: LUFFY MEETS KING NEPTUNE! - One Piece Episode 529 and 530 - Rich Reaction
author: Rich Reaction
description: Reaction video covering One Piece episodes 529 and 530, including the meeting with King Neptune and Hody Jones's display of power.

title: One Piece Episode #530 Anime Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: Written review of One Piece Episode 530 discussing the episode's focus on the Straw Hats' time on Fish-Man Island and the introduction of Neptune.

title: 529-530: The Fish-Man Island Will Be Annihilated?! Sharley's Prophecy! and The King of the Fish-Man Island! Neptune, the God of the Sea!

title: One Piece – Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 523 – 538) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: Comprehensive review of the first portion of the Fish-Man Island arc including episode 530, analyzing the arc's themes of racism and prejudice.
